name: Code n00b
description: You have completed your first commit and have just started your journey as a sofware engineer.

name: Code Apprentice
description: You are following at least one Code Craftsman and have commited 10 PRs.

name: Code Journeyman
description: You have submitted your first PR to a project with 25 or more stars.

name: Code Craftsman
description: You regularly committing to a major repository.

name: Code Hero
description: You have a stackoverflow score of 50,000 points and are a contributor to at least 1 repo with 100 or more stars.
